description:
A law enforcement favourite, the Special Forces GTX is a top-quality all-purpose boot designed to withstand hard use by military, police, and emergency services personnel. This robust and heavy-duty model has a Gore-Tex® lining, making it breathable and fully waterproof. The shock absorbing Vibram® lug sole provides excellent traction on wet terrain while offering superior cushioning for all-day comfort.

This full grain leather boot will keep you dry under the most demanding conditions. With eyelet lacing and military grade rubber not only will you get amazing performance, you can also expect great fit and comfort.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Special Force GTX - Mens
